entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tadoule Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:13 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -29.2°C

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
